00020 namespace luabind { namespace detail {
00021 
00022 inline void inject_backref(lua_State*, void*, void*)
00023 {}
00024 
00025 template <class T>
00026 void inject_backref(lua_State* L, T* p, wrap_base*)
00027 {
00028     weak_ref(get_main_thread(L), L, 1).swap(wrap_access::ref(*p));
00029 }
00030 
00031 template <std::size_t Arity, class T, class Pointer, class Signature>
00032 struct construct_aux;
00033 
00034 template <class T, class Pointer, class Signature>
00035 struct construct
00036   : construct_aux<mpl::size<Signature>::value - 2, T, Pointer, Signature>
00037 {};
00038 
00039 template <class T, class Pointer, class Signature>
00040 struct construct_aux<0, T, Pointer, Signature>
00041 {
00042     typedef pointer_holder<Pointer, T> holder_type;
00043 
00044     void operator()(argument const& self_) const
00045     {
00046         object_rep* self = touserdata<object_rep>(self_);
00047         class_rep* cls = self->crep();
00048 
00049         std::auto_ptr<T> instance(new T);
00050         inject_backref(self_.interpreter(), instance.get(), instance.get());
00051 
00052         void* naked_ptr = instance.get();
00053         Pointer ptr(instance.release());
00054 
00055         void* storage = self->allocate(sizeof(holder_type));
00056 
00057         self->set_instance(new (storage) holder_type(
00058             ptr, registered_class<T>::id, naked_ptr, cls));
00059     }
00060 };
00061 
00062 #  define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_PARAMS_1 \
00063     (3, (1, LUABIND_MAX_ARITY, <luabind/detail/constructor.hpp>))
00064 #  include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()
00065 
00066 }} // namespace luabind::detail
00067 
00068 # endif // LUABIND_DETAIL_CONSTRUCTOR_081018_HPP

00070 #else // !BOOST_PP_IS_ITERATING
00071 
00072 # define N BOOST_PP_ITERATION()
00073 
00074 template <class T, class Pointer, class Signature>
00075 struct construct_aux<N, T, Pointer, Signature>
00076 {
00077     typedef typename mpl::begin<Signature>::type first;
00078     typedef typename mpl::next<first>::type iter0;
00079 
00080 # define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_MACRO(n) \
00081     typedef typename mpl::next< \
00082         BOOST_PP_CAT(iter,BOOST_PP_DEC(n))>::type BOOST_PP_CAT(iter,n); \
00083     typedef typename BOOST_PP_CAT(iter,n)::type BOOST_PP_CAT(a,BOOST_PP_DEC(n));
00084 
00085 # define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_LIMITS (1,N)
00086 # include BOOST_PP_LOCAL_ITERATE()
00087 
00088     typedef pointer_holder<Pointer, T> holder_type;
00089 
00090     void operator()(argument const& self_, BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(N,a,_)) const
00091     {
00092         object_rep* self = touserdata<object_rep>(self_);
00093         class_rep* cls = self->crep();
00094 
00095         std::auto_ptr<T> instance(new T(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N,_)));
00096         inject_backref(self_.interpreter(), instance.get(), instance.get());
00097 
00098         void* naked_ptr = instance.get();
00099         Pointer ptr(instance.release());
00100 
00101         void* storage = self->allocate(sizeof(holder_type));
00102 
00103         self->set_instance(new (storage) holder_type(
00104             ptr, registered_class<T>::id, naked_ptr, cls));
00105     }
00106 };

00108 # undef N
